front.title: Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) EngineID Discovery

abstract.t: To retrieve management information using the third version of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP), it is necessary to know the identifier of the remote SNMP protocol engine. This document introduces a discovery mechanism which can be used to learn the engine identifier of a remote SNMP protocol engine. The proposed mechanism is independent of the features provided by SNMP security models and may be used also by other protocol interfaces to discover the engine identifier.
